title: Don't know what dropped because i can't find it!!
body: So basically, I unlocked a hextech chest using the forged keys. I got some orange essence and I was like ":/ this sucks" and clicked through the "add to loot" button, but the next drop I got said something like "demonic...." and i can't remember exactly but I remember that word being there. I looked through my loot to look for it but i cannot find it.. Anybody know what it might be?!!?

replies.body: Damn, i really hoped it would be, I haven't checked there earlier but there seems to be nothing relevant to demons in the icons :P

Nope, just checked :P 
Sorry I can't help much with the deets.. haha

> [{quoted}](name=Samsung Galaxy,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=AqPAhvG4,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2016-07-13T14:07:15.295+0000)
>
> Nope, just checked :P 
> Sorry I can't help much with the deets.. haha

You should be able to check in the purchases tab.
Yah, I thought so too, but I don't have the skin for it..
